briefTitle: Sexual Health in Breast Cancer Patients
officialTitle: Sexuality and Breast Cancer: Developing Appropriate Education for Women Going Through Treatment
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Determine changes in sexual well-being for women with breast cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients diagnosed with ductal carcinoma in situ or invasive breast cancer, seen in the breast center between 09/01/2019 to present, will potentially be recruited to participate.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients less than 18 years of age and those with non-cancer diagnoses or prior history of breast cancer will be excluded.
